feed.title: Miaow Lab
feed.subtitle: Welcome to the home page for the lab of Ning Miao. Our group focuses in the field of machine reasoning (LLM reasoning, AI4Math) and generative models. We are based at the Department of Data Science and Hong Kong Institute of AI for Science, City University of Hong Kong.
